name: Dog Whistle Teaser Prank
description:
This app is intended for entertainment purposes only and does not provide true Dog Whistle.
Dog Whistle Teaser Prank
Bully Dog Whistle jokes - this is a game simulation of a joke app where you can phone as a whistle! Love to play for friends and loved ones? Want a joke to scare a dog or cat?
Then use our secure whistles to draw! In the game you can choose a different whistles!
With these whistles you can play and be sure that someone does not do no harm! Whistling pet joke!
Make fun and play your family and friends!
Warning game joke created to draw and frolic and absolutely safe for your health!
Play anywhere, because it does not require an internet connection!
Thank you for playing our games and apps! Leave feedback for the game and we will try to make it even better and more interesting!
